# Test Fixtures Attribution

This directory contains excerpts (first page only) from academic papers
used for testing purposes. All papers are licensed under CC BY 4.0.

## Papers

### sample_llama.pdf

- **Title**: LLaMA: Open and Efficient Foundation Language Models
- **Authors**: Hugo Touvron, Thibaut Lavril, Gautier Izacard, Xavier Martinet,
  Marie-Anne Lachaux, Timothée Lacroix, Baptiste Rozière, Naman Goyal,
  Eric Hambro, Faisal Azhar, Aurelien Rodriguez, Armand Joulin,
  Edouard Grave, Guillaume Lample
- **arXiv**: https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.13971
- **License**: [CC BY 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

### sample_cot.pdf

- **Title**: Chain-of-Thought Prompting Elicits Reasoning in Large Language Models
- **Authors**: Jason Wei, Xuezhi Wang, Dale Schuurmans, Maarten Bosma,
  Brian Ichter, Fei Xia, Ed Chi, Quoc Le, Denny Zhou
- **arXiv**: https://arxiv.org/abs/2201.11903
- **License**: [CC BY 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
